title: Best of the Program | Guests: Justin Barclay & Don Piper | 12/24/19
description:
Pastor Don Piper joins the program to tell the story of how he lay dead on a Texas highway for 90 minutes, yet through his faith and the prayers of those around him, he returned to reveal some of what lies in heaven.

Don Piper's book, "90 Minutes in Heaven," is available everywhere books are sold and has been adapted into a 2015 film.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
